Class MySQLDatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.util.MySQLDatabaseManager

  • public class MySQLDatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host,
           java.lang.String dbName,
           java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
             throws DatabaseConnectionException
        Connect to a MySQL Database with the provided information.
        Parameters:
        host - The host (host name or ip address) of the MySQL Server.
        dbName - The database name.
        username - The username to connect to the database.
        password - The password to connect to the database.
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException - If the manager is unable to connect the database.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws DatabaseConnectionException
        Disconnect from the database.
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException

      • query

        public java.sql.ResultSet query(java.lang.String query)
                         throws MalformedQueryException,
                                java.lang.Exception
        Query the database. FOR SECURITY PURPOSES, IT IS PREFERRED THAT YOU USE THE PREPARED STATEMENT.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to execute.
        Returns:
        The result set the query returned.
        Throws:
        MalformedQueryException - A malformed query has been provided.
        java.lang.Exception - Any other exception thrown by the database.

        public void manipulationQuery(java.lang.String query)
                       throws MalformedQueryException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        Query the database, which a query that will manipulate data. Examples include: INSERT, DELETE, MODIFY IF YOU ARE MANIPULATING DATA, IT IS RECOMMENDED YOU USE A PREPARED STATEMENT.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to execute.
        Throws:
        MalformedQueryException - A malformed query has been provided.
